summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Advanced Dashboard Features for Pro tier. All 17 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing confirmed feature gating works correctly: Free users see PRO badge on Analytics tab with upgrade prompt, Pro users see full advanced dashboard with priority review banner, performance metrics, trends, status breakdown, complexity distribution, and ARRIS activity timeline.
passed_tests: GET /api/creators/me/advanced-dashboard requires authentication
GET /api/creators/me/advanced-dashboard returns 403 for Free tier with upgrade URL
GET /api/creators/me/advanced-dashboard returns 200 for Pro tier with full data
Advanced dashboard includes dashboard_level, has_priority_review, has_advanced_analytics flags
Performance metrics include total_proposals, approval_rate, avg_review_time_hours, completed, in_progress
Pro users with priority_review get priority_queue_position
Monthly trends include monthly_submissions array with month and count
Status breakdown includes status, count, and latest timestamp
Complexity distribution includes complexity level and count
ARRIS activity includes total_interactions, successful count, and recent_activity timeline
Insights summary includes top_performing_month and most_common_complexity
Free user has dashboard_level='basic' in feature-access
Pro user has dashboard_level='advanced' in feature-access
Dashboard level in advanced-dashboard matches feature-access
Pro user has proposals and ARRIS logs in the system
Approval rate calculation is correct (0-100%)
Frontend: Free user sees PRO badge on Analytics tab
Frontend: Free user sees upgrade prompt with feature preview cards
Frontend: Free user sees 'Upgrade to Pro' button
Frontend: Pro user sees full advanced dashboard
Frontend: Pro user sees Priority Review Active banner with queue position
Frontend: Pro user sees performance metrics (100% approval rate, 72h review time)
Frontend: Pro user sees Submission Trends chart
Frontend: Pro user sees Status Breakdown
Frontend: Pro user sees Project Complexity distribution
Frontend: Pro user sees ARRIS Activity timeline
Frontend: Header shows correct tier badge (FREE/PRO)
Frontend: Header shows 'Upgrade' for Free users, 'Manage Plan' for Pro users
seed_data_creation: Pro test creator (protest@dashboard.com) has Pro subscription with 3 proposals and 6 ARRIS usage logs. Test data includes proposals with different statuses (approved, in_progress, completed) and complexity levels (Low, Medium, High).

frontend_ui.free_user_analytics_tab: PRO badge, upgrade prompt, feature preview cards - VERIFIED
frontend_ui.pro_user_analytics_tab: Full dashboard with all metrics and charts - VERIFIED
frontend_ui.upgrade_button: Upgrade for Free / Manage Plan for Pro - VERIFIED

context_for_next_testing_agent: Advanced Dashboard feature fully implemented and tested. Pro+ users (dashboard_level='advanced' or 'custom') get full analytics including: performance metrics (approval_rate, avg_review_time), monthly submission trends, status breakdown, complexity distribution, ARRIS activity timeline, and priority review status. Free/Starter users (dashboard_level='basic') get 403 with upgrade prompt. Test credentials: protest@dashboard.com (Pro tier), testcreator@example.com (Free tier).
